revision.text: Possibly: Thoukydidou peri tou peloponnÄ“siakou polemou biblia okto [Greek transliterated] = Thucydidis De bello peloponnesiaco libri octo ... = History of the Peloponnesian War) (Thucydides; translated by John Hudson; Aemilius Portus). 8v. (Oxoniae : E Theatro Sheldoniano, impensis T. Bennet, 1696). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/23615739
